Title: Re-editing Viral Notes to Add Product Links
Content: When a note suddenly goes viral without a product link, you can re-edit it to add the link. There are two scenarios to consider. First, if your note has gone viral and you want to add a product link, click on the three dots in the upper right corner and select 'Edit.' Then, click on 'Associate Product,' confirm, and republish. The note will show today's date as the publication date, but all likes, saves, and comments will remain intact. Second, if the note's views have plateaued or dropped, you can re-edit the cover and add small stickers or text. This minor adjustment can help re-engage viewers and make the note appear as newly published while retaining all previous interactions.

Title: Maintaining Engagement on Viral Notes
Content: Maintaining engagement on viral notes is crucial for sustained visibility. If a note's views start to decline, minor edits can help revive interest. For instance, you can update the cover image or add small stickers or text to make it more appealing. These changes can make the note appear fresh and attract new viewers. Additionally, interacting with comments and encouraging discussions can keep the engagement high. Responding to comments and asking questions can create a sense of community and encourage more interactions. Regularly monitoring the note's performance and making necessary adjustments can help maintain its visibility and engagement over time.

Title: Effective Use of Editing Tools for Viral Notes
Content: Using editing tools effectively can enhance the appeal of your viral notes. When re-editing a note, focus on making subtle changes that can attract new viewers without altering the original content significantly. For example, updating the cover image or adding small stickers or text can make the note look fresh. These minor adjustments can help re-engage viewers and attract new ones. Additionally, using the 'Associate Product' feature to add product links can help monetize the note. Ensure that the edits are relevant and enhance the overall appeal of the note. Regularly updating and optimizing your notes can help maintain their visibility and engagement.
